details.publicNotes: Leading a mismatched band of creatures, a lone raven-headed griffon smiles as he meets you. “More friends.” They look quite pleased indeed.

description.value: The target creature within reach of the griffon must make a @Check[type:will|dc:24]{Will Save} or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1} as they laugh. A critical failure results in @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 2}.

With a quick squawk, the griffon vanishes, becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} for two rounds. This ends on taking a hostile action. The griffon may not use this spell again for [[/r 1d4]] rounds.
